official_title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations in Section 212(b) of the Merchant Marine Act of 1936, relating to mobile trade fairs.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982 through 1986 for mobile trade fairs.
